named-query.name: Vehicle.findByPlate
named-query.query: select v from Vehicle v where v.plateNumber = ?1

named-query.name: WorkOrder.findByIds
named-query.query: select a from WorkOrder a where a.id in ?1

named-query.name: WorkOrder.findByPlate
named-query.query: select w from WorkOrder w join w.vehicle v where v.plateNumber = ?1

named-query.name: WorkOrder.findNotInvoicedByClientDni
named-query.query: select w from WorkOrder w join w.vehicle v where v.client.dni = ?1 and w.status <> ?2

named-query.name: PaymentMean.findByInvoiceId
named-query.query: select m from Invoice f join f.workOrders w join w.vehicle.client c join c.paymentMeans m where f.id = ?1

named-query.name: Mechanic.findByDni
named-query.query: select m from Mechanic m where m.dni = ?1

named-query.name: Client.findByDni
named-query.query: select c from Client c where c.dni = ?1

named-query.name: Invoice.findByNumber
named-query.query: select f from Invoice f where f.number = ?1
